pageProduct.name: Schwarzkopf Live Colour Metallic Rose Gold
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Schwarzkopf Live Colour Metallic By Ultra Brights Semi- Permanent Rose Gold creates metallic tones in 3 minutes for a shimmering metalised finish, is good for 8 washes and contains no ammonia.

Re-create the latest trend and achieve stunning metallic tones with Schwarzkopf LIVE Colour Metallic by Ultra Brights. The shimmering shades deliver beautiful shine for an overall metalised and polished look.

The ready to use formula requires no pre-mixing and works in just 3 minutes!

Change your hair colour as often as you like with Schwarzkopf LIVE Colour Metallic by Ultra Brights!

Gentle Conditioning Colour

- Enriched with a colour mask that adds superior condition and shine.

- Gentle formula contains no peroxide or ammonia.

- Will not lighten hair.

- Lasts up to 6 to 8 washes.

Rose Gold Metallic by Ultra Brights semi-permanent colour adds condition and vivid shine for a polished metallic look.

Boxed Contents: 30mL sachet of colour, instruction leaflet, gloves.

Size: 1 Pack

Hair Colour: Rose Gold

Warnings

Keep out of reach of children.
This product contains ingredients which may cause skin irritation to certain individuals. A preliminary test according to the accompanying directions should be made before use. This product must not be used for dyeing eyelashes or eyebrows; to do so may be injurious to the eye.

FIRST AID INFORMATION

For advice, contact a Poisons Information Centre (Phone Australia 13 11 26); New Zealand 0800 764 766) or a doctor. If in eyes, wash out immediately with water.

Ingredients

Aqua, Cetearyl Alcohol, Coconut Alcohol, Ceteareth-20, Disodium Cocoamphodipropionate, Methylparaben, Parfum, Polyquaternium-6, Propylparaben, Propylene Glycol, Etidronic Acid, Ethanolamine, Quartz, HC Blue No. 16, Basic red 51, basic Violet 2.

Directions

A skin sensitivity test and a strand test should be undertaken before each application. Read instructions carefully.

USAGE ADVICE

Quick & Easy To Apply
- Shampoo and towel dry hair.
- Apply colour with gloves and leave on for 3 to 10 minutes.
- Rinse thoroughly and style as usual.
- For long thick hair we recommend using two or more packs.
